pageContext.claim: “The Failing New York Times has knowingly written a very inaccurate story on my intentions on Syria. No different from my original statements, we will be leaving at a proper pace while at the same time continuing to fight ISIS and doing all else that is prudent and necessary!.....”
pageContext.analysis: Much of the criticism of Trump's decision to withdraw U.S. troops from Syria was based on the abrupt timeline, which some said risked destabilizing the region. The administration has since walked things back and stretched out the timeline for withdrawal, as the New York Times noted a day before this Trump tweet.
